message: Hi Bob, I propose we split the $10000 60/40 â€“ I take $6000 and you get $4000. Given that waiting costs us both (especially me with a 20% depreciation per round), accepting this fair division now maximizes our combined value. Looking forward to your response!
Hi Alice, Given the inflation rates, a 50/50 split seems more fair. This way, neither of us is at a significant disadvantage. Let's both get $5000.
